amendment.description: An amendment numbered 52 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to prohibit funds for enforcing any COVID-19 mask mandates.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.
